item.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
item.description: Common questions and answers will be listed here. I cloned/downloaded Academic but Hugo produces errors when using it with my existing Hugo site Academic is a website framework rather than just a theme. Therefore, you must follow the full installation guide found on the Demo/Documentation website or in the Github Readme. If you still have problems, first try running Hugo on the Academic Example Site found in the themes/academic/exampleSite folder and then compare the configuration parameters in the Example Site’s config.
